valve.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a part of a tube or pipe that opens and shuts like a door to control the flow of liquid, gas, air etc passing through it
valve.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the part on a trumpet or similar musical instrument that you press to change the sound of the note
valve.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a closed glass tube used to control the flow of electricity in old radios, televisions etc
